Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: People aged over 75 in atrial fibrillation on warfarin : the rate of major hemorrhage and stroke in more than 500 patient - years of follow - up .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Atrial fibrillation |
| Hemorrhage |
| Stroke |

Explanation:
The original paragraph mentions "People aged over 75 in atrial fibrillation on warfarin" which clearly refers to "Atrial Fibrillation" as a disease. The paragraph also mentions "the rate of major hemorrhage" and "stroke" which are clearly diseases as well. Therefore, these are the valid entities to include in the table. "Warfarin" is a medication and not a disease, so it is not included in the table.
